That audio hiss can be fixed in VLC by going to "Tools", then "Effects and Filters" on the defatul tab ("Audio Effects") Select BOTH "Enable" and "2 Pass"
and set the "Preset" to "Live".

I have to be honest, I just saw Iron Man 3 in IMAX 3D, and I have to say that with the Cams I have seen of this movie you miss out on A LOT of detail that you would normally see in a theater or on DVD. IF you can afford it go see this movie at a theater, if you can't then a very good quality CAM is for you. Just my 2 cents
